titleStmt.title: Useful instructions for a professing people in times of great security and degeneracy delivered in several sermons on solemnm occasions / by Mr. Samuel Willard ...

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through; torn with loss of print; best copy available for photographing.
